short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: gain more info about Mac apps and request install assistance/support from macverse

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You can gain more info about Mac apps and request install assistance/support from Macverse. this add-on will add a link to the Macverse website on the App store page of apps that you can use to access support/tutorial resources from Macverse easily
